doc.title: Chips (Pier Pressure Trilogy)
doc.plot: Lucy is young sweet and innocent and desperate to fit in with the It girls of her local town, Mike and Azzar are unemployed drop outs with a history of crime. When their paths cross abruptly they will all be forced to make choices that will affect all their lives forever. It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.
